Articles.Content:
Hello

I love KSP and I play on Mac.

One thing I never succeed to do is to do quickload.

F5 is assigned for quick save and it works when I use it whenever during the game.

F6 is assigned for quick load, but nothing happens when I use it. I mean no, the game continue where it is, there is no change no window to make any choice....

I dont see how to use it....

Do you hold down the quick load button or just press it?

When you press the quick load button there should be a short text in the upper right corner asking you to hold the key down to quick load or something.

Xell on my Mac and in the settings of the game (Misc) F6 is the quick load.

F9 is just defined for MIssion Control in the Mac Prefs

So when I press the F6 button in the game or old it nothing happens....
Quickload doesn't work on the Mac version (or at the very least, I've yet to find a way to make it work in all the time I've played.)
Aeshi It does work on mac, you gotta hold down function while you press F5 and F9
